document.masterDocTitle: Additional records of osmiine bees (Hymenoptera: Megachilidae: Osmiini) from Siberia

Distribution in Siberia. Tomsk Prov., Kemerovo Prov., Altayskiy Terr., Altai Rep., Khakass Rep., * Tyva Rep., Krasnoyarsk Terr., Irkutsk Prov., Buryatia Rep.

General distribution. Russia (European part, Siberia, Far East); Europe, North Africa, Georgia , Azerbaijan , Turkey , Syria , Jordan , Israel , Iran , Central Asia, Kazakhstan , Mongolia , North-East China , North America (introduced).
